title: This Was My Sister
medium: gouache on paper board mounted to paper board
description: medium weight, wove cardboard mounted by artist to heavy woodpulp cardboard which has extensive labels
inscriptions: l.l. in gouache: Breinin -40; verso on mount u. edge, 5 exhibition stickers: [Museu Nacional de Belas Artes]; verso u.l. on sticker: [Downtown Gallery label]; u.c. on sticker: [packer's label, NY,NY.]; verso u.r. on sticker: No. 41624/ picture; verso u.c. in ink: RAYMOND BREININ/ "THIS WAS MY SISTER"/ [crossed out]/ $100.00; verso c.l. in white chalk: [illegible]/ WALDORF; verso c. in red crayon: N3 [encircled]; verso l.l. in crayon: 40[underlined]/ -66; verso c.r. in crayon: 6232[illegible]/ 105; verso u.r. on sticker on frame: No. 41624/ frame
